statements: DELETE FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_id = 100 AND meeting_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM meetings_schedule WHERE meeting_date < '2022-12-31' AND meeting_id IN (SELECT meeting_id FROM meetings_schedule WHERE agenda LIKE '%important%');
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM notes WHERE note_id IN (SELECT note_id FROM notes WHERE content LIKE '%urgent%');
